byline.contributor: Adam Liptak reported from Washington, and Manny Fernandez from Houston.
byline.original: By ADAM LIPTAK and MANNY FERNANDEZ

abstract: Supreme Court votes, 5 to 4, to allow 10 abortion clinics in Texas to remain open while justices consider whether to hear appeal from decision effectively ordering them to close; is second time Supreme Court has given clinics a reprieve, allowing more than a dozen of them to reopen in fall of 2015.
lead_paragraph: The justices will consider whether to hear an appeal of a decision effectively ordering the clinics to close.

headline.main: Supreme Court Allows Texas Abortion Clinics to Remain Open
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Allows Texas Abortion Clinics to Stay Open

snippet: The justices will consider whether to hear an appeal of a decision effectively ordering the clinics to close.
